creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
When I try to use the Search feature on this page:
http://olr.kbs.uni-hannover.de:8080/lenya/default/live/doctypes/xhtml-
document.html
I get this:
---
404: Page not found  

The requested document does not exist
The requested document '/search-live/lucene' with document-id '/search-
live/lucene' does not exist. 
---

See also bug 29023.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
As it works on Windows 2000 now it should be verified with 1.2RC4.2 on Unix-
type OS.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: Correction of previous comment: it still does not work on Windows 2000.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
the page was not published.

http://olr.kbs.uni-hannover.de:8080/lenya/default/search-live/lucene?queryString=lenya&dummy-index-id.fields=contents&sortBy=score&find=Search

works fine. the results page is wrong though.
